Race.SpecificTitle: City of Kenner HRC Prop. #1 -- HRC Amend.-Mayor & CC-Political Activity
Race.SummaryText:
City of Kenner Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
City Charter Amendment No. 1

Summary:  A charter amendment to provide for restriction of political activity for nonelected City of Kenner employees on behalf of a city candidate in City of Kenner elections.
Race.FullText: Shall the Home Rule Charter of the City of Kenner be amended to provide for restriction of political activity for nonelected city employees for candidates in a City of Kenner election all as stated in Resolution No. B-16261, adopted by the Kenner City Council on June 7, 2012?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Kenner HRC Prop. #2 -- HRC Amend-Mayor&CC-$100,000Contract
Race.SummaryText:
City of Kenner Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
City Charter Amendment No. 2

Summary:  A charter amendment to Section 2.09 to require contracts with a value of $100,000.00 or more be ratified through ordinance by the Kenner City Council.
Race.FullText: Shall the Home Rule Charter of the City of Kenner be amended to provide that contracts valued at $100,000.00 or more be ratified through ordinance by the Kenner City Council all as stated in Resolution No. B-16269, adopted by the Kenner City Council on June 21, 2012?
